右键单击“幻灯片轮播转场特效包”，然后单击卸载。
396: After it is has been uninstalled, click Install again.
卸载完成后，再次单击安装。
398: If the crash issue persists after the content pack updated, please contact CyberLink customer service for further assistance:
如果更新内容包后崩溃问题仍然存在，请联系讯连科技客服以获得更多帮助：
402: 2. Choose “Video” then tap on “Stock video” or choose “Photo” then tap on “Stock Photo”.
2. 选择“视频”>“视频素材”，或选择“照片”>“图片素材”。
404: 4. If you download a clip with the “$” icon* and import it to your project, the tab “Pay for stock content used” will show in the top left corner of the project.**
4. 如果您下载带有“$”图标的片段并将其导入您的项目*，项目左上角将显示“购买使用的素材”标签。**
406: 6. The dialog “Buy premium Getty Images stock media” will inform you buy to produce the video.***
6. “购买 Getty Images 媒体素材”对话框将通知您购买素材以制作视频。***
407: * Only subscribers of the PowerDirector Mobile are able to see and buy premium Getty Images stock media in the Media Library.
* 只有威力导演行动版的订阅者才能在“媒体库”中查看和购买 Getty Images 的高级媒体素材。
408: **您最多可以试用 10 个高级片段。
409: You will receive a pop-up message if you add the 11th premium stock media to the timeline.
如果您将第 11 个高级媒体素材添加到时间线，将收到弹出消息。
410: ***You will pay for the additional stock media in the app and the payment method depends on your Play Store or App Store Settings.
***您需要在应用程序中另外购买高级媒体素材，其付款方式取决于您的 Play 商店或 App Store 设置。
411: The premium stock media is consumable, so it cannot be refunded.
高级媒体素材属于消耗品，因此无法退款。
415: Open the CyberLink app that you originally purchase iStock premium media with.
打开您最初用于购买 iStock 高级媒体的讯连科技应用程序。
416: 在威力导演 365 Windows/Mac 版本中：
418: Click the Stock Content icon in the Media Room, and then click iStock (Getty Images) tab in the online media library window.
单击媒体室中的线上素材图标，然后单击在线媒体库窗口中的 iStock (Getty Images) 选项卡。
419: Click the tab to browse the media you already purchased.
单击 选项卡来浏览已购买的媒体。
421: 在相片大师 365 Windows/Mac 版本中：
422: Click Stock Photos to import photos from the online media library into the Library module.
单击图片素材，以将在线媒体库中的照片导入到“图库”模块中。
423: Select the iStock (Getty Images) tab on the online media library window.
于在线媒体库窗口中选择 iStock (Getty Images) 选项卡。
424: Click the tab to browse the media you've already purchased.
单击 选项卡来浏览已购买的媒体。
425: Select the purchased media to re-download it to PhotoDirector's library for further editing.
选择购买的媒体将其重新下载到相片大师的“图库”模块中，以进一步编辑。
426: If you have other questions about purchasing or using the iStock's media in CyberLink software, please don't hesitate to contact our customer service team to get further assistance:
如果您对在讯连科技软件中购买或使用 iStock 的媒体有其他疑问，请随时联系我们的客户服务团队以获得进一步的帮助：
428: I received a message saying my hardware is not compatible.
我收到消息显示我的硬件不兼容。
431: These features utilize the NVIDIA GPU hardware's computing power to process and add the effects to your media clips.
这些功能利用 NVIDIA GPU 硬件的计算能力来处理您的媒体片段并添加效果。
434: Intel Core i5 8600, AMD Ryzen R5 2600 or higher (Recommended)
Intel Core i5 8600、AMD Ryzen R5 2600 或更高（建议使用）
435: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060, Quadro RTX 3000, TITAN RTX or higher that supports NVIDIA Broadcast SDK* feature
支持 NVIDIA Broadcast SDK 功能*的 NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060、Quadro RTX 3000、TITAN RTX 或更高版本
438: The Internet connection is required to download or update the NVIDIA features components.
下载或更新 NVIDIA 功能组件需要 Internet 连接。
440: * To learn more about the NVIDIA Broadcast SDK feature that NVIDIA offers in its GPU products, please refer to the introduction on NVIDIA website.
* 想要了解更多关于 NVIDIA 在其 GPU 产品中提供的 NVIDIA Broadcast SDK 功能，请参考 NVIDIA 网站上的介绍。
443: If your products were purchased from the CyberLink website, download and install the CyberLink Application Manager to get your programs.
如果您的产品是从讯连科技网站购买的，请下载并安装讯连科技 Application Manager 以获取您的程序。
446: But one size doesn’t fit all.
然而创作的需求不尽相同。
448: You only pay for the individual items that you keep in your produced video.
您只需为制作视频中保留的个别项目付费。
449: CyberLink Products Unaffected by Log4j Vulnerability
讯连科技的产品未受到 Log4j 漏洞问题的影响
450: CyberLink is aware of the recently disclosed security issue for the Apache Log4j utility, a commonly used component for logging requests.
讯连科技已注意到近期揭露关于 Apache Log4j 实用工具（一款用于日志记录请求的常用组件）的安全问题。
451: We want to inform you that none of CyberLink's software products or web services use versions of Log4j that are affected by the vulnerability.
我们在此通知讯连科技的软件产品或 Web 服务均未使用受到此漏洞影响的 Log4j 版本。
453: If you have further concerns about the security of our products, please contact CyberLink customer support to let us know.
如果您对我们产品的安全性有其他疑虑，请联络讯连科技客服支持。
